title: On the gunline
creator_credit: Department of the Navy and Supreme Films
brief_description: The Australian guided missile destroyer HMAS Perth at war in Vietnam. Shows the routine of war for the officers and men, self maintenance and preparations at the U.S. Navy base at Subic Bay in the Philippines, underway replenishment of fuel and ammunition and action on the gunline off South Vietnam.
creator_credit_for_label: Department of the Navy and Supreme Films
